features.name: Todo Management
description: Create new todos with title and optional due date
Filter by all / active / completed status

features.name: Theme
description: Card - based layout with subtle shadows

guides.name: Database Schema
hints: Use UUID primary keys instead of auto - increment integers
Add createdAt and updatedAt timestamps automatically
Use soft deletes ( deletedAt field ) instead of hard deletes
Add index on userId and dueDate for query performance

guides.name: Input Validation
hints: Trim whitespace from title before saving
Due date must be today or in the future
Validate on both frontend and backend

guides.name: Performance
hints: Use debounce ( 300 ms ) for filter changes
Cache completed todos in localStorage for offline access
Lazy load todo details on expand

guides.name: Accessibility
hints: Support keyboard navigation ( Tab , Enter , Escape )
Add ARIA labels for screen readers
Color contrast ratio must be at least 4.5 : 1
Focus indicators on all interactive elements

guides.name: Performance
hints: The app must perform like hell

guides.name: Fetching data or posting data
hints: avoid infinite loops when fetching data or posting data inside useEffect or similar
